name: Chaurus
location: Dwemer ruins, Falmer lairs, deep caves
stunts: Poison Spit: Can attack at range using Fight skill. Successful hits create 'Poisoned' aspect with two free invokes
Armored Shell: +2 to defend against physical attacks with blades (not blunt weapons or magic)
Falmer Bond: When fighting alongside Falmer, both gain +1 to Fight
notes: Chaurus are giant insects that live in underground environments, particularly in Falmer-controlled areas. The Falmer breed and use them as guard animals and livestock. They attack with poisonous spit and powerful mandibles. Their armored shells make them difficult to damage.
combat_tactics: Chaurus spit poison at range when possible, then close for melee. They are slow but relentless. Often fight alongside Falmer as guard creatures. They don't retreat and fight until destroyed.
